## Olivia Test

```{r}
df <- read.csv('/Users/dalvinikita/Downloads/PCA_Data_Olivia.csv', header=TRUE) %>%
  mutate(sample = paste0(Org.line,'_',AUC))
rownames(df) <- df$sample
df <- df[,1:5]

mypalette<-c(brewer.pal(name="Set3", n=12), brewer.pal(name="Set2", n=7),"steelblue", "hotpink")
col.patient <- mypalette[as.factor(df$Drug)]
shape_values <- c(22,23)
shape <- shape_values[as.factor(df$Doses)]

mds_cpFeatures <- cmdscale(dist(df),k=2)

plot(mds_cpFeatures[, 1], 
     mds_cpFeatures[, 2], 
     type = "n", 
     xlab = "MDS Dimension 1", 
     ylab = "MDS Dimension 2")
points(mds_cpFeatures[, 1], 
       mds_cpFeatures[, 2], 
       pch = shape, 
       bg = col.patient)


```
